rukus.text: Lo! We sent Noah to his people, saying, "Warn your people before there come upon them a painful doom
He said, "O my people! Surely I am a plain Warner to you
That you should serve Allah and be careful of your duty to Him and obey me
He will forgive you some of your faults and grant you a delay for an appointed term; surely the term of Allah when it comes is not postponed; did you but know
He said, "O my Lord! Surely I have called my people by night and by day
But my call has only increased their flight (from truth)
And whenever I have called them that you may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, cover themselves with their garments, grow obstinate and puffed up with pride
So I called to them aloud
And lo! I have made public proclamations unto them, and I have appealed to them in private
And I have said, ´Ask forgiveness of your Lord, surely He is the most Forgiving
´He will send down upon you an abundance of rain
´And help you with wealth and sons, and bestow on you gardens, and bestow on you rivers
´What ails you that you fear not the greatness of Allah
´Seeing that He has created you through various stages
´Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens, one above another (or in harmony)
´And made the moon therein a light, and made the sun a lamp
´And Allah has made you out of the earth as a gradual growth
´Then He returns you to it, and then will He bring you forth a new bringing forth
´And Allah has made for you the earth a wide expanse
´ That you may go about in it in spacious paths (or valleys).´
